description: A badge is a small square or circular component for representing user avatars. These can be in the form of an image, an icon or a two character string (e.g. the user's initials).

props.name: label
props.description: The two character initials to display on the badge.

props.name: image
props.description: URL of the image to display on the badge.

props.name: icon
props.description: An icon to display on the badge.

props.name: circular
props.description: If true, render the badge as a circle, instead of a square.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the badge - Small, Medium or Large.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the badge. This is one of the provided NeonFunctionalColors.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Display the badge in the disable style
